articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un provided field guidance to the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, kindling a torch for modernizing railways.
					 He went round the monuments to revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the room for preserving historic relics and the room dedicated to the history of the complex.
					
					 He recalled that the President established the complex in November 1945, with deep insight into the importance of railways as the artery of the country and pilot of the national economy, adding the Workers' Party of Korea is as old as the complex.
					
					 He underscored the need for the complex to effectively conduct education through revolutionary relics to help its employees deeply grasp the undying feats performed by the great leaders so that they may successfully play their role of vanguard and standard-bearers in implementing the party policies by giving steady continuity to the proud history and tradition in which they have remained loyal to the party for the past seven decades.
					
					 Going round the passenger car shop, science and technology disseminating room, processing shop No. 1, electric cable shop and other places, he learned in detail about the situation of the complex and set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by it.
					
					 He gave an instruction for producing more electric locomotives of the new generation on the basis of cutting-edge technology and waging a dynamic drive to develop and produce new underground electric cars of Korean style in the shortest period.
					
					 There is no fortress unconquerable for us if the revolutionary stamina of the heroic working class is combined with modern science and technology, he said, underlining the need for the complex to meticulously organize the work for putting production processes on a high CNC and unmanned basis, regularly operating the science and technology disseminating room, giving fuller play to the vitality of the study-while-working educational system and consolidating the foundation of supply service.
					
					 In order to more dynamically step up the building of a thriving socialist nation, it is necessary to decisively modernize the railways of the country, he said, calling for modernizing the railways as required by the new century in the spirit of holding in high esteem the great leaders who used to travel by train day and night, prompted by the desire to provide the people with a happy life at an early date. He promised to personally supervise this work and help it make progress.
					
					 He stressed the need to conduct the drive for modernizing railways stretching across the country as an important policy issue, push forward it by focusing the efforts of the party and the state on it and buckle down to it in the spirit of breaking ground and thus turn the nation's railways into those to be proud of in the world as early as possible.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Ri Jae Il and Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Lao Ambassador
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Phonekham Inthaboualy, new Lao ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Polling Stations in DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Polling Stations in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests staying in the DPRK Sunday visited polling stations for the elections of deputies to the provincial, city and county people's assemblies in Pyongyang and local areas.
					 After visiting a polling station, Vladislav Ri, staff member of the Russian consulate general in Chongjin, said:
					
					 I am glad to visit the polling station for the elections of deputies to the local people's assemblies in the wake of the visit to the one for the election of deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 Today is like a significant holiday for the DPRK.
					
					 It also marks the 15th anniversary of Russian President Putin's visit to the DPRK.
					
					 The staff member sang together with artistes of the North Hamgyong Provincial Art Troup to be acclaimed by voters and other masses.
					
					 Yuri Mitushin, head of a Russian film delegation, said that he respects the DPRK's elections and his delegation visited the DPRK to significantly mark the year of Russia-DPRK friendship, expressing hope that the peoples of the two countries would steadily cooperate with each other in the future, too.
					
					 A staff member of the mission of the WFP here said after going round a polling station:
					
					 I could read happiness and joy on the faces of voters. 
					
					 I could feel support for candidates and pride in the government, watching old women and other voters singing and dancing.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Chongjin, July 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Chongjin Port on Monday on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present there were the captain and crewmen of the Kiribati-flagged ship New Global.
					
					 Speakers praised the President as a legendary hero who led the three year-long hard fought Fatherland Liberation War in the 1950s to a victory, beating back the U.S. imperialists and their allies.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists brought to the Korean front every human and material resource they could mobilize and applied all most brutal and vicious war methods in the war history but they only sustained a miserable defeat.
					
					 They are threatening and pressurizing the DPRK through war moves against it and "human rights" racket, oblivious of the lesson taught by history, but these will get them nowhere.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: N-S Dialogue Can Never Be Political Plaything for S. Korean Regime; CPRK Secretariat
articles.content:
N-S Dialogue Can Never Be Political Plaything for S. Korean Regime; CPRK Secretariat
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is nowadays zealously calling for "dialogue" and "exchange" with the approach of August 15, day of Korea's liberation.
					 Some times ago, the speaker of the "National Assembly" of south Korea proposed "talks between speakers of the assemblies of the north and the south", addressing an "event for celebrating the constitution day". And the gentries of the puppet Defense Ministry "invited" the DPRK side to what is called "Seoul security dialogue", a confab for escalating confrontation with it.
					
					 In this regard the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued its information bulletin No. 1099 on Sunday. 
					
					 Even at this time when the Park Geun Hye regime trumpets about "dialogue", human scum in south Korea continue scattering anti-DPRK leaflets under the wire-pulling of the U.S. and the puppet authorities and the military gangsters are resorting to such saber-rattling against the DPRK as "joint logistic support maneuver" with the U.S. allegedly to cope with someone's "provocation", the bulletin pointed out, saying:
					
					 Worse still, the puppet group is getting hell-bent on the anti-DPRK smear campaign while spreading such nonsensical sophism as "instable social system" and "terror-ridden politics".
					
					 For the puppet regime to call for "dialogue" without making a fundamental switchover in its policy of hostility toward the DPRK is a mockery of its dialogue partner and an act of deceiving the public opinion at home and abroad. Such crude wordplay will only invite ridicule and criticism.
					
					 If "talks between speakers of the assemblies of the north and the south", touted by the puppet group, are to take place, the south Korean puppet National Assembly should have decency to settle the national issue independently.
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities are chief culprits who derailed the north-south dialogue through mud-slinging at compatriots in the north and confrontation and war moves against it, turning down every chance for improved north-south relations. Though they are loudly talking about "dialogue" in a bid to conceal their sinister intention, nobody will pay heed to it.
					
					 The north-south dialogue can never be a political plaything for the despicable south Korean puppet group.

articles.title: Week of Russian Film Show Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
Week of Russian Film Show Opens in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A week of Russian film show for DPRK-Russia friendship year opened with due ceremony at the Taedongmun Cinema on Monday.
					Present there were Kim In Bom, vice-minister of Culture who doubles as director-general of the General Bureau of Films, officials concerned, creators and artistes in the field of movie industry, charge d'affaires ad interim Alexandr Minaev and staff members of the Russian embassy here, a Russian film delegation and Russians staying here.
					
					The participants watched a Russian feature film.

articles.title: Meeting with DPRK Hero Held
articles.content:
Meeting with DPRK Hero Held
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A meeting with a DPRK hero took place at the Central Hall of Workers Monday to celebrate the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Present at the meeting were officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea and other workers.
					
					 DPRK Hero Kim Sung Un, a lecturer at the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, said that President Kim Il Sung wisely led all service personnel and people and thus brought about a shining victory, defeating the U.S. imperialists who launched a war of aggression to nip the DPRK in the bud.
					
					 He said that thanks to the President's Juche-oriented military idea, war methods, strategies and tactics the army and people of the DPRK could defeat the numerically and technically superior U.S. imperialists by means of political and ideological advantages, displaying the matchless self-sacrificing spirit and popular heroism, and demonstrate the dignity and honor of the country and nation before the world.
					
					 He recalled that he shot down five planes of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces by fighting as taught by the President who advanced the superb tactics of downing enemy planes and had the honor of being receiving the title of the DPRK Hero.
					
					 He talked about the heroic battles the KPA soldiers fought by dedicating their youth and lives to the victory in the war in hearty response to the orders of their supreme commander.

articles.title: Social System in DPRK Stimulating Sports Development
articles.content:
Social System in DPRK Stimulating Sports Development
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK sportspersons have made great achievements at different international games in recent years.
					 In particular, the 2012 London Olympic Games came to be an occasion for the DPRK to step into the limelight. In the 17th Asian Games, the DPRK took the first place at the women's football match.
					
					 Mother of Ra Un Sim, captain of the DPRK women's football team, told KCNA it was beyond imagination that her daughter has been awarded the title of Labor Hero.
					
					 Her talent began to bud under the deep care of many people including teachers and coaches of the juvenile sports school, Ra's mother said, adding her daughter's success would have been unthinkable without the socialist system in the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has many sports schools and modern sports facilities together with well-organized system of selecting and training reserves.
					
					 Children with talents for sports can develop their abilities at those sports schools at the state's expense.
					
					 Now the DPRK has witnessed an epoch-making change in the field of sports, thanks to the wise guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is reliably carrying forward the intention of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to build a sports power.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Forces Can Never Evade Responsibility for Derailed Inter-Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Forces Can Never Evade Responsibility for Derailed Inter-Korean Relations: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet chief executive and other conservatives recently talked about "open-minded dialogue," "all possibilities for dialogue". They urged the DPRK to "come out to the negotiating site for dialogue".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 With no rhetoric for "dialogue" can the puppet group conceal its ugly colors as it is seeking only confrontation and war, not dialogue and improved relations, and getting hell-bent on the moves for stifling the DPRK together with foreign forces.
					
					 The puppet authorities have never responded to the sincere efforts of the DPRK.
					
					 As a crow cannot be whiter for often washing, the puppet forces obsessed with the confrontation against the DPRK remain unchanged in their treacherous nature, no matter how frequently they advertise about "dialogue". A mask of hypocrisy and deception has already been taken off. No one will be taken in by "dialogue" touted by the confrontation maniacs seized with the ambition to do harm to fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 The puppet authorities should not trumpet about "dialogue" but apologize to the entire nation for chilling the atmosphere of north-south dialogue and driving tension into an extreme phase through reckless provocations against the DPRK and give up the criminal confrontation policy at once.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the puppet group evade the responsibility for the derailed inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Demands Probe into IS's Illegal Acts
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Demands Probe into IS's Illegal Acts
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Human Rights Centre of the south Korean Council of Christian Churches in a commentary on July 15 demanded the puppet Intelligence Service (IS) own responsibility for perpetrating criminal acts by use of a hacking program for surveillance, according to south Korean CBS.
					 The organization urged the IS to clarify to the people how many cases of phone eavesdropping and interference in the elections of the "president" and members of "the National Assembly" it perpetrated by use of the hacking program and demanded that all those involved in the illegal acts be punished.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Puppet Group's Suppression
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Puppet Group's Suppression
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency investigated the financial status of the Taegu-North Kyongsang Provincial Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration which sponsored reunification lectures given by Sin Un Mi, a Korean professor in the U.S., and Hwang Son, representative of the south Korean Forum for the Study of Politics Desired, under the pretext of looking into them.
					 The puppet police investigated the financial activities of the headquarters and the work done by it in 2014 and informed it of the fact recently six months later.
					
					 And the police stretched the tentacles of suppression even to those organizations and individual persons that had dealings with the headquarters.
					
					 The headquarters released a statement on July 7 in protest against the suppression.
					
					 The statement urged the prosecution and police to apologize to the persons concerned and organizations for the human rights abuses.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Scatter Anti-"Government" Leaflets
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Scatter Anti-"Government" Leaflets
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- South Korean students scattered anti-"government" leaflets in Seoul on July 17, according to the south Korean newspaper Hangyore.
					 They scattered more than three thousand leaflets from atop buildings around the "National Assembly" building reflecting curse and resentment at the present puppet ruling forces who turned the whole area of south Korea into a veritable hell under the reign of fascist dictatorship in violation of the "constitution." 
					
					 The leaflets contained a statement titled "We mourn the end of the constitutional government".
					
					 The statement said that the constitutional government met its end and illegal acts are rampant in south Korea, adding that all people are obliged to fulfill duties while those in power only are guaranteed rights.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by OSPAAAL
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by OSPAAAL
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A seminar, film show and photo exhibition were held by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America (OSPAAAL) on July 8, the 21st anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the revolutionary career of the President.
					
					 Present at the events were the director of the Political Department of the OSPAAAL and its members, representatives of foreign political parties in Cuba, the charge d'affaires ad interim and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Havana.
					
					 The director of the Political Department of the OSPAAAL said:
					
					 The President is always remembered as he paid deep attention to the work of OSPAAAL from the outset of its foundation and made great contributions to its development.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced by Russian, Brazilian Media
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced by Russian, Brazilian Media
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Russian and Brazilian media carried articles and photos introducing the DPRK.
					 The Russian paper Bremya Peremon Plus TV on July 7 carried its reporter's travelogue on the DPRK, illustrated with a panoramic picture of Pyongyang and photos showing a happy life of the Korean children and people.
					
					 After arriving in Pyongyang, the reporter felt the breathing of the DPRK making a leap forward toward the future, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Streets in Pyongyang were clean and its people in gorgeous and neat dresses were full of life.
					
					 The DPRK has dynamically and confidently advanced toward outer space and enforced popular polices such as free education system and free medical care despite extreme sanctions and blockade by the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 The Korean people are full of confidence in the future of Korean-style socialism as they are achieving great successes in all fields.
					
					 The Korean society is characterized by warm love for children.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its website on July 3 a photo-accompanied article introducing the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang whose looks have undergone a dramatic change as an example and icon of the construction of socialist rural culture.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation to Be Celebrated in Germany
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation to Be Celebrated in Germany
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation was inaugurated by the Communist Party of Germany on July 13.
					 Torsten Schoevitz, chairman of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee deiced to significantly hold a meeting, seminar, film show and other political and cultural events from July 13 to August 15.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Laud Kim Il Sung's Military Exploits
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Laud Kim Il Sung's Military Exploits
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Russian and Bulgarian papers carried special write-ups on the 62nd anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The 26th issue of the Russian paper Veteran carried an article illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The President was a generalissimo who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation, the paper said, and went on:
					
					 He beat down the Japanese imperialists and liberated Korea from their military occupation in the last century.
					
					 In the Korean war he defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and fully demonstrated the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 Miraculous victories achieved by the DPRK were the brilliant fruition of his strategies, tactics, military war methods and superb commanding art.
					
					 He led the fierce confrontation with U.S. imperialism to victory in the post war period, reliably defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country.
					
					 His military exploits will shine forever in the world history of struggle against imperialism.
					
					 The July issue of the Bulgarian paper Iskra said in an article titled "July 27, day of victory" that the Korean people grandly celebrate July 27 as the day of victory in the war every year as they defeated U.S. imperialists and won great victory.

articles.title: Foreign Papers Laud Personality of Kim Il Sung as Great Man
articles.content:
Foreign Papers Laud Personality of Kim Il Sung as Great Man
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups illustrated with portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and photos documenting his feats from July 7 to 10 on the occasion of the 21st anniversary of his demise.
					 The Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, tender-hearted image" said:
					
					 When remembering the President, his tender-hearted image with broad smile on his face comes across into one's mind. 
					
					 It is the personality peculiar to him as a great man that he treated people with sunny smile and took warm care of them with paternal affection.
					
					 His tender-hearted image will always be cherished in the hearts of all people.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud in an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, holding aloft the banner of independence" praised the President for embarking upon the road of revolution in his teens and performing immortal exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The Nepalese paper Arpan in an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, eternal sun of Juche" said that the human history knows no such great man as the President.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Denounce U.S. and S. Korean Authorities for Taking Issue with DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Denounce U.S. and S. Korean Authorities for Taking Issue with DPRK
Pyongyang, July 20 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on July 14 in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces' moves to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces recently talked nonsense that the Pyongyang Bio-technical Institute is the "latest facilities for producing poisonous anthrax germs" and "a bio-weapons factory camouflaged as a civilian enterprise."
					
					 This is groundless and malignant sophism.
					
					 The institute is the scientific research and production base from A to Z.
					
					 A spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK in a statement strongly condemned the groundless and false sophism of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 It is the height of impudence for the U.S. to find fault with the DPRK as the former introduced anthrax germs into south Korea to impose disaster of nuclear and germ warfare on the Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK are bound to go bust.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un participa en elecciones de diputados
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un participa en elecciones de diputados
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, participo el dia 19 en las elecciones de los diputados a las Asambleas Populares de las provincias, las ciudades y los distritos, en el subdistrito No. 102 del distrito No.107 para las elecciones de diputados a la Asamblea Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang y en el distrito No. 102 para las elecciones de diputados a la Asamblea Popular del municipio Sosong.
					El Mariscal recibio las cedulas electorales que le entrego el presidente del subdistrito No. 102 del distrito No. 107 para las elecciones de diputados a la Asamblea Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang y voto a favor de la candidata a diputada a la Asamblea Popular de la Ciudad de Pyongyang, Ho Myong Gum, conductora del batallon de la estacion ferroviaria de Pyongyang, perteneciente a la Empresa de Trolebus de Ryonmot, y al candidato a diputado a la Asamblea Popular del municipio Sosong, Sin Sun Thae, jefe de taller de elaboracion No. 2 del Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae.
					
					El Mariscal departio con los candidatos a diputados.
					
					Evaluo los meritos de ellos quienes dedicaron la fidelidad ardiente, el entusiasmo patriotico y toda la abnegacion por el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo de la RPDC, con el verdadero espiritu de servicio al Partido, el lider, la patria y el pueblo, y les estimulo a cumplir, como digno representantes del pueblo, con su noble mision y obligacion asumidas en el esfuerzo por transformar nuestro pais como mejor potencia del mundo y paraiso del pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Ri Jae Il y Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Locomotoras Electricas Kim Jong Thae y avivo el fervor de la modernizacion del ferrocarril.
					El Mariscal recorrio la lapida a las actividades historico-revolucionarias de los grandes Lideres, la sala de conservacion de objetos historico-revolucionarios y la de presentacion del historial.
					
					Senalo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung hizo establecer esta fabrica tras percatarse de la importancia del ferrocarril, arteria del pais y vanguardia de la economia nacional y anadio que la empresa tiene la misma edad de fundacion de nuestro Partido.
					
					Deben profundizar la educacion a traves de la historia revolucionaria para inculcar a los empleados las inmortales hazanas de los grandes Lideres para que ellos cumplan con exito el papel de vanguardias en la materializacion de las politicas del Partido, al heredar firmemente la gloriosa historia y tradicion de 70 anos pasados en que apoyaron con  fidelidad a nuestro Partido, apunto.
					
					Recorriendo el taller de vagones de pasajeros, la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, el taller de elaboracion No. 1, la fabrica de alambres electricos y otros lugares, el Mariscal estudio en detalle la situacion de la empresa y presento las tareas programaticas asumidas ante esta planta.
					
					Ordeno fabricar muchas locomotoras electricas de nueva generacion dotadas con la tecnica sofisticada y esforzarse por desarrollar y fabricar nuevamente en un corto tiempo los  trenes electricos del metro.
					
					Si se combinan el coraje revolucionario de la heroica clase obrera y la ciencia y tecnica modernas, no habra la meta inconquistable, dijo y agrego que la empresa debe organizar con escrupulosidad el trabajo para introducir en alto nivel la tecnologia de CNC y la automatizacion sin empleado en el proceso productivo, normalizar la administracion de la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, manifestar mas la vitalidad del sistema de ensenanza para trabajadores y consolidar firmemente la base del servicio de abastecimiento.
					
					Para acelerar con mas vigor la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista se debe modernizar decisivamente el ferrocarril del pais, dijo y exhorto a modernizarlo segun la demanda del nuevo siglo con el sentimiento de acoger a los grandes Lideres quienes tomaban a menudo el tren para ofrecer cuanto antes una vida feliz a nuestro pueblo y agrego que el mismo se encargara de este trabajo para llevarlo a feliz termino.
					
					El Mariscal subrayo que al tomar como importante asunto politico el esfuerzo por modernizar el ferrocarril de todo el pais y acelerarlo con la fuerza concentrada de todo el Partido y Estado, asi que con la decision de sacar la primera palada debemos transformar, cuanto antes, el ferrocarril de nuestro en un objeto digno de enorgullecer a todo el mundo.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Ri Jae Il y Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: CRPP condena disparates de "dialogo" N-S de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
CRPP condena disparates de "dialogo" N-S de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Con  motivo del 15 de agosto que viene, la banda titere surcoreana habla tanto de "dialogo" e "intercambio" entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					En su "discurso de felicitacion al dia de constitucion recien sostenido, el presidente de la Asamblea Nacional del Sur de Corea nos propuso las "conversaciones entre los presidentes de  parlamentos Norte-Sur", y los compinches del Ministerio de Defensa nos "invitaron" al "Dialogo de Seguridad de Seul", lugar de conspiracion anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria publico el dia 19 la informacion No. 1099, revelando que la banda de Park Geun-hye habla del "dialogo", mientras instiga junto con EE.UU. el lanzamiento de volantes de contenido anti-RPDC de las escorias humanas y los gangsteres militares siguen desarrollando los simulacros de guerra de agresion a la RPDC inclusive el "entrenamiento combinado de asistencia de medios militares" junto con EE.UU., so  pretexto de la "provocacion" de alguien.
					
					Para colmo, difunde los disparates absurdos como "inestabilidad del regimen" y "politica de terror" y se entrega mas a la campana intrigante anti-RPDC, asi condena el documento y prosigue:
					
					Los disparates del "dialogo" sin el cambio radical de la politica hostil contra los connacionales son una burla contra su contraparte y el engano a la opinion publica del exterior e interior y tal pueril juego de lengua sera burlado y censurado por todo el mundo.
					
					Para realizar las "conversaciones entre los presidentes de parlamentos Norte-Sur", la Asamblea Nacional del Sur de Corea tiene que guardar primero el honor capaz de solucionar de manera independiente el problema nacional.
					
					Nadie prestara oido a los disparates del "dialogo" de quienes rechazaron todas las oportunidades de la mejora de las  relaciones intercoreanas y rompieron el dialogo N-S mediante las maldiciones difamantes y los ejercicios de guerra contra los connacionales.
					
					El dialogo Norte-Sur no puede ser juguete politico de la banda titere surcoreana.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia farsa intrigante anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia farsa intrigante anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos acusa a ciegas el Instituto de Biotecnologia de Pyongyang, base de investigacion cientifica y produccion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, de "instalacion ultramoderna de produccion de los bacilos de antracosis de fuerte toxicidad" y de "fabrica de armas biologicas disfrazada de una empresa  civil".
					Francamente dicho, los tipejos viles e impotentes se valen de farsa intrigantes.
					
					Asi burla el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 19 y continua:
					
					Muy atemorizado por el fracaso de su anacronica politica hostil anti-RPDC, el pais norteamericano muestra el sintoma de psicopata.
					
					Cuanto mas maldiga EE.UU. con las palabras inventadas, tanto mas se avergonzara y recibira el ataque demoledor.
					
					Cuando la RPDC habia optado el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo, no habia esperado la alabanza ni la buena fe de EE.UU.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC experimentan mas profundamente que el camino optado por si mismos fue mil veces correcto, cuanto mas EE.UU. nos ofenda e impida atrozmente nuestra marcha.
					
					Avanzaremos sin vacilacion hacia la meta fijada por nosotros, por la senda optada y segun nuestro horario.
					
					La pueril farsa intrigante adelantara la autodestruccion de EE.UU.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia violacion de DDHH de SNI de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia violacion de DDHH de SNI de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedo revelado, segun un dato escapado de la empresa de hacking de un pais, el hecho de que desde hace unos anos, el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia (SNI) del Sur de Corea compro en ultramar un programa de hacking, para interceptar los computadores personales y telefonos moviles.
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 19, Minju Joson lo califica de atroz violacion de DDHH inimaginable.
					
					El SNI insiste en que lo compro para el "desarrollo de investigacion", pero, tal sofisteria no convencera a nadie, subraya el periodico y prosigue:
					
					Lo intolerable es que tales maniobras de SNI se desarrollaban coincidiendo con las elecciones "presidenciales"  que causaron grandes escandalos.
					
					Las maniobras de compra del programa de hacking de SNI reveladas esta vez persiguen el objetivo de realizar con el metodo fraudulento las lecciones presidenciales a favor de la mandataria actual y mantener de continuo su dominacion fascista al recrudecer mas la interceptacion y la vigilancia a todos los habitantes de diversos estratos surcoreanos.
					
					Mientras exista en el poder la banda titere que no toma en consideracion los derechos humanos de las amplias masas populares trabajadoras, no se garantizaran nunca en el Sur de Corea los derechos humanos autenticos.
